workflow.name: Shopify order fulfillment & send tracking link via WhatsApp using Rapiwa API
workflow.description:
# Shopify Order Fulfillment & Send Tracking Link via WhatsApp Using Rapiwa API

## Who is this for?
This **n8n workflow** automatically sends **WhatsApp notifications** to customers when their **Shopify orders are fulfilled**. It extracts order details, validates customer phone numbers for WhatsApp compatibility using the **Rapiwa API**, sends tracking information via WhatsApp, and logs all interactions in **Google Sheets** with appropriate verification status.

---

## What this Workflow Does
This **n8n workflow** listens for new **order fulfillments** on Shopify and automatically sends a **WhatsApp message** with tracking details to customers. It uses the **Rapiwa API** to verify if the customer's number is on WhatsApp, formats all the data, sends a message, and logs everything to **Google Sheets** for tracking and auditing purposes.

---

## Key Features
- **Webhook-Triggered**: Activates on new Shopify fulfillment events
- **Phone Number Validation**: Uses Rapiwa to check WhatsApp compatibility
- **Tracking Message Automation**: Sends real-time tracking messages via WhatsApp
- **Data Cleaning**: Formats phone numbers and customer data
- **Smart Branching**: Separates verified and unverified WhatsApp users
- **Google Sheets Logging**: Stores data with status labels for all messages
- **Rate-Limit Protection**: `Wait` node helps space API calls
- **Dual Sheet Logging**: Maintains separate records for verified and unverified numbers

## Requirements
### Tools & Services
- An **n8n instance** (self-hosted or cloud)
- A **Shopify store** with REST API access enabled
- A **Rapiwa.com account** with:
  - Valid Bearer Token
  - Connected and verified WhatsApp number
- A **Google Sheet** with the following columns:
   - Like this [Sample Sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vxocktoY-y-PYBZNxmUDuQv02b5F8QKhbQ0yLHjwjBY/edit?usp=sharing)
- **Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials** set up in n8n
- **Shopify API credentials** added to n8n
- **Rapiwa Bearer Token** added as `httpBearerAuth` credentials

---

## How to Use
### Step-by-step Setup
1. **Connect Shopify to n8n**
   - Use the **Shopify Trigger** node
   - Set event to `fulfillments/create` to capture new fulfillment events

2. **Extract Webhook Data**
   - Use a **Code Node** to format the webhook response
   - Capture order, customer, and tracking details

3. **Fetch Complete Order Information**
   - Add an **HTTP Request Node** using Shopify Admin API
   - Include the order ID to retrieve customer phone, email, and product details

4. **Clean the Phone Number**
   - Use a **Code Node** to:
     - Remove non-numeric characters
     - Format number to international standard
     - Combine customer first and last name

5. **Batch Process Orders**
   - Use the **Split In Batches** node to handle customers one-by-one

6. **Validate WhatsApp Number**
   - Use Rapiwa‚Äôs `/verify-whatsapp` endpoint with a Bearer Token
   - Check if number exists on WhatsApp

7. **Conditional Branching**
   - Use an **If Node**:
     - If `data.exists === "true"` ‚Üí Verified path
     - Else ‚Üí Unverified path

8. **Send WhatsApp Message**
   - Send tracking info with a personalized message:
     ```
     Hi [Customer Name],
     Good news! Your order has just been fulfilled.
     Tracking Number: [Tracking Number]
     Track your package here: [Tracking URL]
     Thank you for shopping with us.
     -Team SpaGreen Creative
     ```

9. **Log Data to Google Sheets**
   - Log verified and unverified entries in **separate sheets**
   - Include all relevant customer and tracking data

10. **Add Delay Between Messages**
    - Use the **Wait Node** to avoid rate limits on Rapiwa API

---

## Requirements
- A **Shopify store** with API access enabled
- A **Google Sheet** with required column like this ‚û§ [Sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vxocktoY-y-PYBZNxmUDuQv02b5F8QKhbQ0yLHjwjBY/edit?usp=sharing)
- **Rapiwa API account**:
  - Connected WhatsApp number
  - Valid Bearer Token
- **n8n** with:
  - Shopify API credentials
  - Rapiwa Bearer Token
  - Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials

---

## Google Sheet Column Reference
**A Google Sheet** formatted like this ‚û§ [Sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vxocktoY-y-PYBZNxmUDuQv02b5F8QKhbQ0yLHjwjBY/edit?usp=sharing)

| customer_id   | name            | email                          | number        | tracking_company | tracking_number | tracking_url                                | product_title                          | status     |
|---------------|-----------------|--------------------------------|---------------|------------------|-----------------|---------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------|------------|
| 8986XXXX06 | Abdul Mannan | contact@spagreen.net  | 8801322827799 | Amazon Logistics | SG-OT-02        | https://traxxxG-OT-02 | S25 Ultra 5G Smartphone     | verified   |
| 883XXX7982 | Abdul Mannan     | contact@spagreen.net             | 8801322827799 | Amazon Logistics | SG-OT-N03       | https://traxxxGOT-N03| Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra  | verified   |

---

## Workflow Logic Summary
1. **Shopify Webhook Trigger**: On order fulfillment
2. **Extract Webhook Payload**
3. **Fetch Order + Customer Details**
4. **Clean and Format Phone Number**
5. **Split into Single-Item Batch**
6. **Check WhatsApp Validity via Rapiwa**
7. **If Verified:**
   - Send WhatsApp Message
   - Log to verified sheet
8. **If Not Verified:**
   - Skip message
   - Log to unverified sheet
9. **Add Delay with Wait Node**
10. **Repeat for Next Fulfillment**

---

## Customization Ideas
- Modify WhatsApp message to include delivery date or store contact
- Send different messages for different product categories
- Use `product_type` or `shipping_zone` to trigger separate workflows
- Add admin alerts for unverified numbers
- Store message delivery status (e.g., success, failed)

---

## Notes & Warnings
- Rapiwa is an **unofficial WhatsApp API** ‚Äî delivery reliability is not guaranteed
- The **Google Sheet column `name ` must include the space at the end**
- **Wait node** may need longer delay for high-volume stores
- Always format phone numbers in **international format** (e.g., `8801XXXXXXXXX`)
- Shopify API version used is `2025-07` ‚Äî update as newer versions release
- You must comply with WhatsApp terms and data privacy laws when messaging users

---

 ## Useful Links
- **Dashboard:** [https://app.rapiwa.com](https://app.rapiwa.com/login)
- **Official Website:** [https://rapiwa.com](https://rapiwa.com/)
- **Documentation:** [https://docs.rapiwa.com](https://docs.rapiwa.com/)

## Support
- WhatsApp Support: [Chat Now](https://wa.me/8801322827799)  
- Discord: [Join SpaGreen Community](https://discord.gg/SsCChWEP)  
- Facebook Group: [SpaGreen Support](https://www.facebook.com/groups/spagreenbd)  
- Website: [https://spagreen.net](https://spagreen.net)  
- Developer Portfolio: [Codecanyon SpaGreen](https://codecanyon.net/user/spagreen/portfolio)

nodes.name: Check valid whatsapp number Using Rapiwa

documentId.cachedResultName: Shopify - Send tracking link via WhatsApp

parameters.content:
# Shopify Order Fulfillment & Send Tracking Link via WhatsApp Using Rapiwa API


# Overview
This **n8n workflow** automatically sends **WhatsApp notifications** to customers when their **Shopify orders are fulfilled**. It extracts order details, validates customer phone numbers for WhatsApp compatibility using the **Rapiwa API**, sends tracking information via WhatsApp, and logs all interactions in **Google Sheets** with appropriate verification status.
---
## Features
- Listens to **Shopify fulfillment creation** via webhook
- Retrieves detailed **order and customer information** from Shopify
- **Cleans and formats** customer phone numbers
- **Validates WhatsApp numbers** using Rapiwa's verification API
- Sends **automated WhatsApp messages** with tracking details to verified numbers
- Logs customer data in **Google Sheets** with verification status
- Includes **Wait node** to space out API calls and prevent rate limiting
- Handles both **verified and unverified** numbers with appropriate branching
---
## Requirements
### Tools & Services
- **Shopify store** with API access
- **Google Sheet** formatted with required columns
- **Rapiwa API account** with:
  - Valid **Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE**
  - Access to `verify-whatsapp` and `send-message` endpoints
  - Connected WhatsApp number
- **Active Rapiwa subscription** (~$5/month)
### n8n Credentials
- **Shopify Access Token API** credentials
- **Rapiwa Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE** credentials
- **Google Sheets OAuth2** credentials
### Google Sheet Required Columns:
- `customer_id`
- `name ` (note the trailing space)
- `email`
- `number`
- `tracking_company`
- `tracking_number`
- `tracking_url`
- `product_title`
- `status` (either `verified` or `unverified`)
> **Note:** Field `name ` contains a trailing space. Keep it as-is.
---
## Nodes Used in the Workflow
- **Shopify Trigger** (webhook for fulfillment creation)
- **Format Webhook Response Data** (code node for data extraction)
- **get all customer data** (HTTP request to Shopify API)
- **Clean Number** (code node for phone number formatting)
- **Loop Over Items** (split in batches node)
- **Check valid whatsapp number Using Rapiwa** (HTTP request)
- **If** (conditional branching based on verification)
- **Send Message Using Rapiwa** (HTTP request for WhatsApp messaging)
- **verified append row in sheet** (Google Sheets node)
- **verified append row in sheet1** (Google Sheets node for unverified)
- **Wait** (delay node)
---
## How to Use This Workflow
### 1. Trigger: New Fulfillment Created
- **Node**: `Shopify Trigger`
- **Event**: `fulfillments/create`
- **Function**: Shopify sends payload when a new fulfillment is created.
### 2. Format Webhook Response
- **Node**: `Format Webhook Response Data`
- **Function**: Extracts key information including:
  - `order_id`, `fulfillment_id`, `status`
  - `tracking_company`, `tracking_number`, `tracking_url`
  - `product_title`, `customer_name`, `country`
  - `shop_domain`
### 3. Retrieve Customer Data
- **Node**: `get all customer data`
- **Method**: `GET`
- **URL**: `https://your_domain.myshopify.com/admin/api/2025-07/orders/{{ $json.order_id }}.json`
- **Headers**: Includes Shopify access token
- **Function**: Retrieves complete order and customer information
### 4. Clean Phone Numbers
- **Node**: `Clean Number`
- **Function**: 
  - Extracts phone number from customer data
  - Removes all non-numeric characters
  - Combines first and last name into full name
  - Formats customer data for downstream processing
### 5. Process in Batches
- **Node**: `Loop Over Items`
- **Function**: Processes customers one at a time
### 6. Verify WhatsApp Number
- **Node**: `Check valid whatsapp number Using Rapiwa`
- **Method**: `POST`
- **URL**: `https://app.rapiwa.com/api/verify-whatsapp`
- **Authentication**: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE
- **Function**: Checks if the phone number is active on WhatsApp
### 7. Branch Based on Verification
- **Node**: `If`
- **Condition**: If `data.exists === "true"`, then verified
- **Function**: Routes to appropriate path based on verification status
### 8. Send WhatsApp Message (if verified)
- **Node**: `Send Message Using Rapiwa`
- **Method**: `POST`
- **URL**: `https://app.rapiwa.com/api/send-message`
- **Authentication**: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE
- **Function**: Sends tracking information via WhatsApp
#### Message Template:
```
Hi [Customer Name],
Good news! Your order has just been fulfilled.
Tracking Number: [Tracking Number]
Track your package here: [Tracking URL]
Thank you for shopping with us.
-Team SpaGreen Creative
```
### 9. Log to Google Sheets
- **Node**: `verified append row in sheet` ‚Üí Logs verified users
- **Node**: `verified append row in sheet1` ‚Üí Logs unverified users
- **Node**: `Wait` ‚Üí Adds delay to avoid API rate limits
---
## Google Sheet Column
**A Google Sheet** formatted like this ‚û§ [Sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vxocktoY-y-PYBZNxmUDuQv02b5F8QKhbQ0yLHjwjBY/edit?usp=sharing)
| customer_id   | name            | email                          | number        | tracking_company | tracking_number | tracking_url                                | product_title                          | status     |
|---------------|-----------------|--------------------------------|---------------|------------------|-----------------|---------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------|------------|
| 8986XXXX06 | Abdul Mannan | contact@spagreen.net  | 8801322827799 | Amazon Logistics | SG-OT-02        | https://traxxxG-OT-02 | S25 Ultra 5G Smartphone     | verified   |
| 883XXX7982 | Abdul Mannan     | contact@spagreen.net             | 8801322827799 | Amazon Logistics | SG-OT-N03       | https://traxxxGOT-N03| Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra  | verified   |

> **Note**: The `name ` column includes a **trailing space**. Do not remove it.
---
## Customization Ideas
- Modify the WhatsApp message template to include additional order details
- Add product images to the WhatsApp messages
- Create separate sheets for different product categories or regions
- Extend logic to send follow-up messages after delivery
- Add notifications to store administrators for failed message deliveries
---
## Notes & Warnings
- Ensure your Rapiwa account has a valid, connected WhatsApp number
- Google Sheets credentials must allow write access to the specified sheet
- The Wait node helps prevent rate limiting but may need adjustment based on volume
- The workflow uses the Shopify API version 2025-07, which may need updating in the future
- Rapiwa is an unofficial WhatsApp API and delivery rates are not guaranteed
- Make sure to comply with WhatsApp's terms of service and customer privacy regulations

## Useful Links
- **Dashboard:** [https://app.rapiwa.com](https://app.rapiwa.com/login)
- **Official Website:** [https://rapiwa.com](https://rapiwa.com/)
- **Documentation:** [https://docs.rapiwa.com](https://docs.rapiwa.com/)

## Support & Help
- **WhatsApp**: [Chat on WhatsApp](https://wa.me/8801322827799)
- **Discord**: [SpaGreen Community](https://discord.gg/SsCChWEP)
- **Facebook Group**: [SpaGreen Support](https://www.facebook.com/groups/spagreenbd)
- **Website**: [https://spagreen.net](https://spagreen.net)
- **Developer Portfolio**: [Codecanyon SpaGreen](https://codecanyon.net/user/spagreen/portfolio)

## 1. Node: Shopify Trigger
**Purpose:**  
This node monitors your Shopify store for the `fulfillments/create` webhook event. It automatically triggers when an order is marked as fulfilled.

**When it‚Äôs Triggered:**  
Whenever an order is fulfilled (i.e., shipped or marked as complete) in your Shopify store.

**Webhook Event:**  
`fulfillments/create`

## 2. Node: Format Webhook Response Data
**Purpose:**  
This node takes the raw data from the Shopify webhook and extracts the key information you need. It organizes the data in a cleaner format for further processing or use.

**Data Extracted Includes:**

- Order ID  
- Tracking number and tracking link  
- Total Price
- Per Product Price
- Product Image link
- Customer‚Äôs name and country  
- Product title(s)

## 1. Node: get all customer data
**Purpose:**
- Uses the `order_id` to make a Shopify API request and get full customer details for that order.


## 2. Node: Loop Over Items
**Purpose:**
- Loops through each item (e.g., fulfillment) in the workflow ‚Äî useful if multiple fulfillments come through at once.

## 1. Node: Check Valid WhatsApp Number Using Rapiwa
**Purpose:**
This node uses [Rapiwa‚Äôs API](https://rapiwa.com) to verify whether a given phone number is registered and active on WhatsApp.


## 2. Node: Clean Number
**Purpose:**
- Extracts and cleans up the customer‚Äôs phone number.
- Formats full name from first and last name.
- Prepares `customer_id`, email, phone, and name.

## 1. Node: If
**Purpose:**
Checks the result of the WhatsApp verification:
If number exists (i.e., valid WhatsApp number), go one way.
If number does not exist, go another way.

## 2. Node: Send Message Using Rapiwa
**Purpose:**
Sends a personalized WhatsApp message to the customer using Rapiwa, with tracking details and a thank-you note.

## 3. Node: verified append row in sheet
**Purpose:**
Logs customer and tracking info to Google Sheets with the status verified (i.e., they have WhatsApp and message was sent).

## 4. Node: verified append row in sheet1
**Purpose:**
Logs the same data to Google Sheets, but with the status unverified (i.e., customer doesn't have WhatsApp, so message wasn't sent).

## 5. Node: Wait
**Purpose:**
Pauses briefly before processing the next item ‚Äî helps to avoid rate-limiting or API overload.

# Workflow Summary
- Webhook receives new Order Fulfillment event from Shopify
- Retrieves full customer details using the Shopify API
- Extracts and formats customer data (name, phone, product, tracking info)
- Cleans and verifies the customer's phone number
- Checks if the number is valid on WhatsApp using Rapiwa
- Sends personalized WhatsApp message with tracking details (if verified)
- Logs all fulfillment and contact info in Google Sheets
- Marks contacts as verified or unverified based on WhatsApp status
- Fully automated, with batching and throttling to prevent overload

main.node: Check valid whatsapp number Using Rapiwa

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
